meta_description: Saskatchewan’s oldest public art gallery, with a focus on Indigenous and contemporary art, contextualized through historic and international work.

admission_text:
## Hours & Admission

| **GALLERY HOURS** | **CRAFT SERVICES CAFÉ HOURS**  
---|---|---  
Mon | CLOSED | Craft Services Café is temporarily closed as we transition to a new vendor. | Tue | 10 AM - 5:30 PM |  | Wed | 10 AM - 5:30 PM |  | Thu | 10 AM - 9:00 PM |  | Fri | 10 AM - 5:30 PM |  | Sat | 11 AM - 5:30 PM |  | Sun | 11 AM - 5:30 PM |  | TICKET PRICES |   
---|---  
General Admission | $12  
Members | Free  
Youth 17 & Under | Free  
*Includes taxes |   
  
**The MacKenzie Art Gallery is committed to ensuring access to the Gallery through partnerships. For more information,[click here.](https://mackenzie.art/experience/community-programming/)**

Administration Office Hours:  
Monday to Friday 8:30 AM – 4:30 PM

[ Get Tickets ](https://mackenzie.art/visit/tickets/) [ Become a Member ](https://mackenzie.art/support/membership/)

## At the MacKenzie

Download a copy of the Gallery’s [At the MacKenzie](https://mackenzie.art/site-content/uploads/2025/11/25-MAG-Fall-Winter.pdf)—a guide to our programs, amenities, as well as current and upcoming exhibitions!

[ Download a copy of At the MacKenzie ](https://mackenzie.art/site-content/uploads/2025/11/25-MAG-Fall-Winter.pdf)

* * *
